House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01026
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING SECTION 99 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8424, OR THE NATIONAL INTERNAL REVENUE CODE OF THE PHILIPPINES
ABSTRACT : Reduces the donor’s tax and provides the rates payable based a total net gifts.
